segments.text: Excuse me . I have just missed the connection plane due to the heavy fog in London . Can I change my ticket now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please Show your ticket and passport .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which flight do you want to change ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The next one to my destination . I have to be there as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S1
